channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - fdisk

item.title: GPT or MBR in the Gentoo Handbook
item.description:
I just committed a set of changes against the Gentoo Handbook (x86 and amd64) with the intent to have better instructions on GPT (GUID Partition Table) layout versus MBR (Master Boot Record) or MSDOS-style layout.

The part on "Preparing the Disks" saw the most changes. It starts with explaining the â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
